item.title: sparse matrix representation for ml in scale
item.description: Am I the only one seeing here a sparse linear regression? Hopefully by the end of this post you’ll see it too (: Its been a while since my last blog post as I’ve started working at SimilarWeb - A company that provides data on internet traffic for various use cases. During this time I’ve encountered an interesting ML problem setup that requires dealing with quite a few technical hurdles.
